result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Status conference on June 22, 2022 at 10:30 am.
Settlement conference on July 13, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Pre-trial/scheduling conference on August 25, 2022 at 08:30 am.

- It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, Crystal Huppert.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, social media including but not limited to texting, Facebook, Twitter, contact through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

If the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bail jumping.

- May retrieve personal belongings from 1600 Namekagon St, Unit 5, Hudson, WI ONE time with law enforcement.

01:50 PM  CO: SJN, RPR: V. Deiss, Clerk: K. Anderson, ADA:   Brian Thomas Smestad and Inern Ali Casey, DF ATTY:  Travis Satorius for today, DF:  Travis Michael Petroske appeared from jail. DE does not qualify for public defender, PFAC given. Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Waives reading. State requests bond. Court orders bond. Prelim time limits waived. Court sets STC for attorney status, SETC and PSC. Adjourned: 1:57 PM. kma  Status conference scheduled for June 22, 2022 at 10:30 am.  Settlement conference scheduled for July 13, 2022 at 02:00 pm.  Pre-trial/scheduling conference scheduled for August 25, 2022 at 08:30 am.
